todos.title: Did you complete follow up task in CRM?
Did you demo ScoutSheet?
Did you follow demo rules (qualified, focus on their issue, don't stray, no ifs)?
Did you go for the close (trial close, just ask for it, pre-contract)?
Did you handoff to customer success?
Did you identify and handle their concerns and objections (feel, felt, found)?
Did you instill a sense of urgency (price increase)?
Did you open with two magic questions (what is their criteria for success, why)?
Did you provide them guarantees (that we can deliver)?
Did you share story and value prop of ScoutSheet?
Did you spend 75% listening and 25% asking questions?
Did you take them to signup page or send them link to signup page?
Did you take time to thank them the next day?
Did you update the CRM (Follow-up Task, Lifecycle, Contact Info, Notes)?
Did you update the CRM (Follow-up Task, Lifecycle, Demo Notes)?
Do they fit our customer profile?
Do we know how they heard about us?
Do we understand their process and hot buttons (where they are getting stuck)?
Do we understand who they are targeting?
If Lead Fits Our Profile, Has Sense of Urgency- Become 'Opportunity'
If Lead Fits Our Profile, Understand Their Success - Become 'Sales Qualified Lead'
If Lead Starts Paying - Become 'Customer'
If Prospect Responds to Us - Become 'Marketing Qualified Lead'
